alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Polk County through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Medulla, or 8 miles south of Lakeland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Bartow, Auburndale, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Fussels Corner, Lake Alfred, Mulberry, Eagle Lake, Inwood, Highland City, Winter Haven Airport, Bartow Municipal Airport, Wahneta, Lakeland Highlands, Willow Oak, and Cypress Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
